iti14:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti14:2.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single hindrance, hindered by which people wander and transmigrate for a long time like the hindrance of ignorance.
iti14:2.2: Hindered by ignorance, people wander and transmigrate for a long time.”
iti14:2.3: That is what the Buddha said.
iti14:4.1: Those who have given up delusion,
iti14:4.4: the root is not found in them.”
iti14:5.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
